thread.title: GM slowing operations in South Korea

title: GM slowing operations in South Korea
text:
GM slowing operations in South Korea 12:40pm EST - 01:11 
General Motors says it's closing one of its four plants in South Korea and incurring an impairment charge as part of a restructuring of its money-losing business in Asia's fourth-biggest economy. Laura Frykberg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
General Motors says it's closing one of its four plants in South Korea and incurring an impairment charge as part of a restructuring of its money-losing business in Asia's fourth-biggest economy.
